ingredients.content: 100 g beetroot, cooked, cut in pieces
80 g carrots, cut in small pieces
10 g fresh ginger, peeled, cut in small pieces
1 pink grapefruit (approx. 150 g), peeled, white pith and pips removed

preparations.content: Place beetroot,Â carrots and ginger in mixing bowl and chop <b>10 sec/speed 5<b>.
Add orange juice, pink grapefruit, water and honey and blend <b>1 min 30 sec/speed 10<b>. Serve immediately.
